Uses of Interface
com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.HBaseClient

  • Packages that use HBaseClient 
    Package Description
    com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase  
    com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.metrics  

    • Uses of HBaseClient in com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase

      Classes in com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase that implement HBaseClient 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoundedHBaseClient
      An HBaseClient that constrains the maximum number of concurrent asynchronous requests.
      class  HBaseClientProxy
      Proxies the HBaseClient API to an HBaseClient.
      class  InstrumentedHBaseClient
      An HBaseClient that is instrumented with Metrics.
      Methods in com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase that return HBaseClient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HBaseClient HBaseClientFactory.build(HBaseClientConfiguration configuration)
      Builds a default HBaseClient instance from the specified HBaseClientConfiguration.
      HBaseClient HBaseClientFactory.build(HBaseClientConfiguration configuration, String name)
      Builds an HBaseClient instance from the specified HBaseClientConfiguration with the given name.
      Constructors in com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase with parameters of type HBaseClient 
      Constructor and Description
      BoundedHBaseClient(HBaseClient client, int maxRequests)
      Create a new instance with the given limit on concurrent requests for the given underlying HBaseClient implementation.
      BoundedHBaseClient(HBaseClient client, Semaphore semaphore)
      Create a new instance with the given semaphore for the given underlying HBaseClient implementation.
      HBaseHealthCheck(HBaseClient client, String name, String table)
      Checks the health of the given HBaseClient by connecting and testing for the given table.
      InstrumentedHBaseClient(HBaseClient client, HBaseInstrumentation metrics)
      Creates a new InstrumentedHBaseClient for the given underlying client.
      InstrumentedHBaseClient(HBaseClient client, com.yammer.metrics.core.MetricsRegistry registry, String name)
      Creates a new InstrumentedHBaseClient for the given underlying client.
      InstrumentedHBaseClient(HBaseClient client, String name)
      Creates a new InstrumentedHBaseClient for the given underlying client.
      ManagedHBaseClient(HBaseClient client, Duration connectionTimeout)
      Manage the specified HBaseClient with the given connectionTimeout.

    • Uses of HBaseClient in com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.metrics

      Constructor and Description
      HBaseInstrumentation(HBaseClient client, com.yammer.metrics.core.MetricsRegistry registry, String name)
      Initialises instrumentation for the given HBaseClient using the given MetricsRegistry.
